task.title: Adding Existing Topics to a Map in Oxygen XML Editor
task.shortdesc: Step by step: you may want to include a topic you have already created to a new DITA map.

context.p: There are several ways to add a topic reference to a map. Perhaps the easiest method is to add a reference to a topic that is already open in the editor:

step.cmd: Open the DITA topic in the main editing window.
Right click the DITA map in the DITA Maps Manager view and choose Reference to the currently edited file from the Append Child Insert Before or Insert After submenu.
step.stepresult: This opens the Insert Reference dialog box with all the required fields already filled in for you. Insert Reference Dialog Box

step.cmd: You can fill in additional information in the various tabs in this dialog box or add it to the map later.
Select Insert and close to add a reference to your topic in the map.
